mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_chat_history WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND del_flag = 0

SELECT ch.user_id AS user_id, ch.recipient_id AS recipient_id, user.username AS username, pi.first_name AS first_name, pi.middle_name AS middle_name, pi.last_name AS last_name, chat.message AS last_message, chat.created_at AS created_at FROM tbl_user_mst AS user INNER JOIN tbl_chat_history AS ch ON user.user_id = ch.recipient_id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info_mst AS pi ON ch.recipient_id = pi.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM tbl_chat GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id ) AS latest_chat ON ch.user_id = latest_chat.sender_id AND ch.recipient_id = latest_chat.receiver_id LEFT JOIN tbl_chat AS chat ON ch.user_id = chat.sender_id AND ch.recipient_id = chat.receiver_id AND chat.created_at = latest_chat.max_created_at WHERE ch.user_id = #{user_id} AND ch.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_chat_history SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND recipient_id = #{recipient_id}
